verses.roman:
anuhrādasya sūryāyāṁ
bāṣkalo mahiṣas tathā
virocanas tu prāhrādir
devyāṁ tasyābhavad baliḥ

synonyms: anuhrādasya—of Anuhlāda; sūryāyām—through Sūryā; bāṣkalaḥ—Bāṣkala; mahiṣaḥ—Mahiṣa; tathā—also; virocanaḥ—Virocana; tu—indeed; prāhrādiḥ—the son of Prahlāda; devyām—through his wife; tasya—of him; abhavat—was; baliḥ—Bali.
translation: The wife of Anuhlāda was named Sūryā. She gave birth to two sons, named Bāṣkala and Mahiṣa. Prahlāda had one son, Virocana, whose wife gave birth to Bali Mahārāja.
